title: Florida- 1b/1bath 55 Building Month Not Available until December
posting_body: Hello, I have a 2 bedroom 2 bathroom Condo at Poinciana Place 3465 Via Poinciana Place on the 4 floor.
This is a turn key Condo, It has everything, just bring your clothes..
I am from Ireland and I am going home to care for my Mom in December..
This is a 55 Plus building !!
You must be over 55 years..
You must be over 55 to live here $3,000.00 a Month Includes Electric/Cable/internet/water/garbage/condo dues.
You will have no Extra bills !!
I would like to meet you in Person before I rent to you..
I am a Travel Nurse and at present I am working in Delaware until November, we can Skype or face time.
I will also do A extensive background check on you !!!
I am very clean and house proud and will only rent to the SAME..!!!
Please look at this area and the community on there website..
I also have a Yellow FJ cruiser and I will rent my car out also if your interested..
No PETS allowed at this building..
This is a 55 plus building, You must be over 55..!!!!!
Please E-mail me and in order to know your not a scam start the e-mail with the word --Ireland---
Without- Ireland- I won't respond..
Keep in Mind this condo is not available until January 1st..
I also will be renting out my Yellow FJ Cruiser if you need a car as I wont need it when I am in Ireland..
I also have a home in Traverse City..
